alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Garden; Grant; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 11 at 3:27AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Sheridan, Garden, Grant and Arthur Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM Friday to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
